title: Cowboys, QBs, MLB, and the Patriots
itunes:title: Cowboys, QBs, MLB, and the Patriots
description:
Colin explains why the Cowboys have no margin for error, why QBs Jameis Winston and Cam Newton haven't been signed yet, why shorting the upcoming MLB season is a good idea, and why the Patriots will most likely have a bad season. Guests include Peter King, Charles Barkley, and Daniel Jeremiah.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
